name: Doodle Alchemy
description:
Doodle Alchemy is a game with impressive graphics and effects. Extraordinary music and sounds create an unforgettable atmosphere!

You start with just 4 elements: air, water, earth and fire. Combine these elements to create new ones! A fascinating journey into the world of knowledge awaits you!

Have fun with your discoveries!

MAIN RESOURCES:

  • Intuitive one-click gameplay

  • Stunning visuals and effects

  • Extraordinary music and sound effects

  • Multiple languages ​​available - Learn new words as you play

  • Wide variety of elements
